I don't see why this fails that way. I could get a dialog saying that I am
trying to change existing line delimiters, but not an exception.
Even if this could not be reproducable using the predefined format action in the
editor, it can still be potentially a problem for users that define new action.

Beside the error, it looks like it worked fine.
So I think that the error should not be logged in this case. A dialog saying
that the line delimiter has been converted to a new line delimiter would be more
helpful for the user.

This is just to inform people who write new code that they produce a document
with mixed line delimiters.
